{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer MR200 |revision=v1.0 |asin=B014VB4N4M,B0161ACBE0 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7MR200V1 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64BV |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, SIM card slot |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |flags=4G LTE modem |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=3C:45:D8 |oui_eth=3C:45:D8 }} {{TagLine|AC750 Wireless Dual Band 4G LTE Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/Archer-MR200.html Product page]
Antenna: 3x internal (Wi-Fi), 2x detachable external (4G LTE) {{see also|TP-LINK Archer C series}}
